page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The collection of the information for this survey was undertaken by Crooksbarn Primary School and Pentland Primary School. At Crooksbarn the 3rd and 4th year pupils were led by Malcolm Harvey, Jean Haste and Chris Carbro and thanks go to the many people who helped with the research and the field trips. Pentland's team was led by Anne Proudfoot and thanks go to the following children:- Karen Jones, Emma White, Claire Smith, Sara Overton, Sharon Owens, Claire Wanley, Lee Dunning, Stephen Leonard, Darren Crook, Ian Crawford and Jeremy Monahan. The disc was compiled by Bob Ryle.
